name: Generalized Locomotive Unifying Epoxy
description:
My Entry for the GMTK 2021 game jam.

I'm not much of a level designer, or an artist, or a sound designer and I didn't even have time to implement sound. I'm a programmer, so I made something mechanically interesting. The last level starts you in the position I was using for testing it, rather than the intended starting position, but I think what I have demonstrates the potential in the concept I came up with.

There are secret features in the code I didn't end up using in the game, I think I overengineered the code.
